alert.note: Alert for Berks; Lehigh (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 1:59PM EDT until June 26 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL BERKS AND NORTHWESTERN LEHIGH COUNTIES... At 159 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamburg, or 10 miles east of Schuylkill Haven, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamburg, Lenhartsville, New Tripoli and Wanamakers. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 31 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
